sentences.english: John Lee is a some-stomvery single, alternativehough be was a nostomvery single two years past.
sentences.chinese: 李約翰此刻已是名人，固然兩年前是臺甫鼎鼎的。

sentences.english: The Marquis de Montcalm was at that time a celebrated royalist .
sentences.chinese: 安靜山侯爵是當時一個大名鼎鼎的保王黨。

sentences.english: The famous passenger car, Sheng-Li (The Victory).
sentences.chinese: 鼎鼎大名的勝利號客車。

sentences.english: The man who achieved this influence was an unlikely candidate for such eminence.
sentences.chinese: 有這麼大影響的人，未必一定會獲得鼎鼎大名。

sentences.english: The famous actor now lives in seclusion.
sentences.chinese: 這位大名鼎鼎的演員現在深居簡出了。

sentences.english: The child would grow up to be Bacchus, the great god of wine.
sentences.chinese: 這個嬰兒就是大名鼎鼎的酒神巴克斯。

sentences.english: The marquis de montcalm was at that time a celebrated royalist.
sentences.chinese: 安靜山侯爵是當時一個大名鼎鼎的保王黨。

sentences.english: This is Mr. Fan, the historian.
sentences.chinese: 這個就是大名鼎鼎的歷史學家範先生。

sentences.english: The first to talk about the famous " Xi State Golden pear".
sentences.chinese: 先來說說大名鼎鼎的“隰州金梨”。

sentences.english: In Hollywood, he is renowned for his ability to solicit money.
sentences.chinese: 在好萊塢，他募集資金的能力大名鼎鼎。

sentences.english: Be in Nanjing, have the Nanjing master shrine of a famous.
sentences.chinese: 在南京，有一個大名鼎鼎的南京夫子廟。

sentences.english: This is the famous tri-color glazed camel carrying musicians.
sentences.chinese: 這就是大名鼎鼎的三彩駱駝載樂俑。

sentences.english: The famous Dazha Crabs come from here.
sentences.chinese: 鼎鼎有名的大閘蟹就出自於這裏。

sentences.english: And then went to the famous Temple.
sentences.chinese: 然後就去了大名鼎鼎的武侯祠。

sentences.english: I made the acquaintance of the well-known adventuress.
sentences.chinese: 我認識了大名鼎鼎的女冒險家。

sentences.english: The writer's fame was at its zenith.
sentences.chinese: 這位作家已經鼎鼎有名了。

first under heaven/number one in the country
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
